meanings.sent1: Back in the old days, people used telegrams to send important messages quickly.
meanings.sent2: I received a telegram from my friend inviting me to their birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The telegram arrived with such urgency that it made me jump in surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a telegram of joy, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The telegram brought news of victory, spreading happiness to all who read it.

meanings.definition: To send a message by telegraph
meanings.sent1: They decided to telegram their family the good news about their new job.
meanings.sent2: I will telegram you the details of the meeting once it's confirmed.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said he would telegram his cat to bring him a snack.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like a telegram, clear and unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The urgency in his voice as he telegrams for help echoed through the room.
